edu.cmu.andrew.areyes.scrabble.core.tiles

Class TripleLetter

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cmu.andrew.areyes.scrabble.core.tiles.AbstractTile
      • edu.cmu.andrew.areyes.scrabble.core.tiles.AbilityTile
        • edu.cmu.andrew.areyes.scrabble.core.tiles.TripleLetter

  • public class TripleLetter
extends AbilityTile
    An AbilityTile that takes a specific tile placed at the same location as this tile and triples that letters point value for the score.
    Author:
    Aaron Reyes

    • Method Detail

      • doAbility

        public int doAbility(java.util.List<Player> players,
            int score)
        Description copied from class: AbstractTile
        Abstract method for a given tile to perform its special ability on the the Players in the Game with the final move score. This ability is limited to changing the overall score of the move. A given tile can take the move's score and change it to whatever it wants and then change the score of any given player's score by any amount desired.
        Specified by:
        doAbility in class AbstractTile
        Parameters:
        players - - the list of Players
        score - - the current score of the move or final score of the move
        Returns:
        the changed score of the move, if applicable
